name: Basic Loops - Straight up Fruit Loops
description:
Looking for a vape that tastes like fruit loops but without all that other stuff you see in commercial juice? No Milk, No Creams, just Cereal goodness. 

MUST USE SILVERLINE version of CAP Fruit Circles for best results. 

OPTIONAL: Add 2% FA Meringue for a bit more mouthfeel and a slight hint of creaminess.
author: westcoastclouds
